bug.author: myungjoo
bug.description: GstTensorInfo type 내에 info 변수의 array size가 NNS_TENSOR_SIZE_LIMIT = 16 이지만, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/be23638a48293c635c88959c9494a842d5186d50/common/tensor_common.c#L774>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/be23638a48293c635c88959c9494a842d5186d50/common/tensor_common.c#L774</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/be23638a48293c635c88959c9494a842d5186d50/common/tensor_common.c#L795>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/be23638a48293c635c88959c9494a842d5186d50/common/tensor_common.c#L795</denchmark-link> 위의 구문에서 structure parsing 시에 size 검사를 수행하지않는다. 대처방안. num_tensors 의 크기를 제한하거나 size검사를 수행한다.

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/635>#635</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
